storyInfo:
Guard's appearance surprises everyone, but Kal'tsit's sudden interrogation of him is even more surprising.
However, the standoffish attitude of the Infected citizen finally eases.

attributes.content: Guard, explain yourself.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I must look exactly like a Reunion member... huh?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: So you know each other.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Right, so everything this Cautus said was a lie.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: You and Reunion have always been on the same side! Isn't that right?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: ...Tati... Did you find any food? The people in the shelter don't have long.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: What more do you want from me?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Let's get you to someplace safe first.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Stay away from her, Guard!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm staying back.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...I know things might be hard to explain.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But we have to be careful. All the Ursus here became Infected of no fault of their own... and they've had a tough time.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Most of them are already on the verge of mental breakdown... All it takes is someone to push them over the edge.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: We've had it 'tough?' You're psycho murderers! Sadistic freaks!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Because of you... look what happened to me! Look what I've become!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: But if you don't leave right now, the devils will find you. You'll be handed over to Reunion.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Patriot's troops have completely pulled out of this area. If you're caught, I can't save you at that point.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Then just let me die! I'd rather die than watch you monsters run rampant!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: What about guerrillas or this so called 'Aegis of the Infected?' ...Are they any different from the rest of Reunion?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: They are. Without them, we'd be dead already.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Tell me then! Right now!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: If they're just trying to do the right thing, why are they still with Reunion? Why'd they do this to our homes?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Why aren't they rebelling? Why aren't they walking out?! Why did they do all this even knowing we've been spat on, persecuted, and killed?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Why didn't your great guerrillas fight back against the patrolling devils? Why?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: I watched them... they used their own hands... to rip... tear...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Patriot can't be everywhere at once.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: When Patriot has to command his forces to defend the sanctity of life, something has gone horribly wrong.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: But... as long as the guerrillas still continue to pass through this area, I can assure you that the truly wicked in Reunion will not set foot here.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That is the difference between Reunion's thugs and Patriot's guerrilla warriors. Patriot, and the Sarkaz as a whole, are much more disciplined than Reunion's ranks.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Where are they then?! Why aren't they here?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: When they left, the other Infected were so much worse, so cruel!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: How is that not their fault? If not for the guerrillas, they never would've turned against us like this, right?! They're just out for revenge on the guerrillas!!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: ...You're wrong.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The guerrillas did the right thing. And while as you said, some may be trying to take revenge on the guerrillas...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: They gave you a chance to survive, so Reunion is retaliating against them. That is all.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: No, they did more than that... One might even say they're defending your dignity. I saw it with my own eyes.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I saw the soldier telling the others to call you by your names, rather than your numbers.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Isn't that right?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And, the reason they left us alone was so that we could help you when they are away.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: ...Chernobog has already been cut up into many pieces.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: There are some places that the guerrillas are stationed, but also many where they are not... If no one can maintain discipline, then if you want to survive... you can only depend on us.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: And that's even assuming we survive.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Amiya, do you believe what I said just now?
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Cautus girl, look... Look! He's Reunion!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: How can you believe anything coming from Reunion? And what about me? Am I supposed to buy into their bullshit now that I'm Infected?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Look, the people you said wanted to murder us... aren't they Reunion?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Now that I'm Infected, is Reunion suddenly going to take me in and treat me better? How the hell am I supposed to know who's who, and which one of you is going to kill me?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: You, Reunion, all of you should just... should just...!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: (Amiya.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Dr. Kal'tsit?)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Don't get worked up.)
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Kal'tsit, we should keep moving.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Why are you here...?! You, of all people!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Are you... trying to eradicate Reunion completely?! Rhodes Island, you're really no better...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: ...Forget that for now! The Sarkaz mercenary patrol is going to pass through this warehouse soon!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: If we don't deal with them, or at least hide, they're going to find us and take us away...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Not to mention the regular Reunion patrols. We don't have much time to find supplies!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: That's why so many are starving, and short on medicine. There's a lot of death among the people of Chernobog.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit! Also... Dr. {@nickname}, I really hope you can trust me. Or at least find somewhere to hide!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: Guard...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Infected Ursus woman.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Do you mean me?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Infecterd Ursus woman, I have some honest questions for you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Y-your accent... you're from the capital of the Empire, aren't you?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: But the way you speak, it's so old-fashioned...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: You're educated.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...I was a copyist at a university, before.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: It's all gone now, thanks to you Infected.
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: All right, do you trust the man behind you? Our Infected former employee, now with Reunion?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: He's... your employee?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: One of Rhodes Island's functions is helping innocent Infected survive in a combat environment.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Whether or not you are innocent remains to be seen...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: However.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Aaaahh!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Y-you, your... what... is... mmng...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: ...never thought I'd see a day when Mon3tr was after me.
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: The blade pressed against your throat has an incision angle of only eight degrees. Another six millimeters deeper and it severs an artery.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Miss.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Um, err...?
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Did he truly work so hard to ensure your survival, as he claimed?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What are you asking... What are you getting at?!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Did he and his Reunion element, or any part thereof, threaten your life or take any action to harm you?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will deal with him in accordance with your response.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Are you threatening me with his life?! I... we... we had nothing to do with each other!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: What about him, individually? Did he go along with Reunion and their crimes against humanity?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Doctor... Kal'tsit... I'm insulted!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I can only rely on the words of eyewitnesses and victims. Since you claim to have guaranteed her right to life, then I have only the young lady's testimony by which to adjudicate your claim.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You gave only your side of the story.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But what she says is also—
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: She's in a different position.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You have power. You can use violence. It doesn't matter what you did with that violence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I felt it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Amiya, it's the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The targets are getting close.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Couldn't... but he...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Did he or did he not protect you from Reunion? Did he or did he not effectively keep you safe from their aggression?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...! The patrol is here! It's not... it's not the guerrillas! You can't... Don't let them...
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: You're not making any sense!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: I am confident our actions are well within the ethical parameters of Ursus. It was you who made the accusation against him.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: He... he did go out regularly, about this time...
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit! Let me... stop the Sarkaz! Or at least... let me get them to go someplace else!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: I need an answer.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Speak. Or we will never know the truth.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Twenty-four meters out, in a straight line. Very close.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Twenty-two meters.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Mon3tr.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Guard?

attributes.content: No! He didn't! He didn't do anything wrong!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: At least... at least nothing I saw!
attributes.name: Ursus Infected

attributes.content: Amiya, Doctor.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Huh?;......;You put on a good show.

attributes.content: Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Darn it... Dr. Kal'tsit! I knew it...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let's go, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our next target is Reunion's Sarkaz patrol team!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm coming too.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Guard, was it?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: You're wrong about me. But I'll protect you. I'll get your revenge for you.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: They'll pay for what they did to you, and my family, and the common people. They'll all pay, for all of it.
attributes.name: Rosmontis
